leaderboard.title: Spooky Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: See who is haunting the top spots in our spine-chilling competition!
leaderboard.footer: Stay spooky and keep collecting those candies!

landing.tagline: Unleash your inner ghoul in this bewitching Halloween social media app!

features.title: Spooktacular Snapshots
features.description: Share your most haunting looks and eerie moments. Earn candy for the best costume!

features.title: Phantom Chat
features.description: Connect with fellow spirits in our global chat or send spine-chilling private messages.

features.title: Candy Leaderboard
features.description: Climb the ranks with your bone-chilling content and become the Halloween legend!

features.title: Haunted Jukebox
features.description: Set the perfect eerie atmosphere with our curated playlist of spooky tunes.

features.title: Cursed Candy Store
features.description: Trade your hard-earned candy for exclusive items and supernatural surprises.

features.title: Cloudinary Sorcery
features.description: Enhance your creepy captures with AI-powered image editing, courtesy of Cloudinary.

cloudinary.title: Powered by Cloudinary
cloudinary.description: Elevate your Halloween persona with AI-powered image editing and seamless media management.

footer.hackathonName: MiduDev x Cloudinary Hackathon 2024: Spooky AI Creations

settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the SpookLens experience

aboutModal.description: A Halloween-themed social media app with AI-powered features!

store.title: Store Coming Soon!
store.description: Our spectral shopkeepers are still brewing up the Spooky Candy Store. Dare to peek inside, or haunt us again later for a spine-chilling shopping spree!

chats.title: Chats Coming Soon!
chats.description: Our phantom programmers are setting up the haunted chat rooms. For now, you can join the Global Haunted Chat!

tutorialModal.title: SpookLens Grimoire
tutorialModal.comingAttractionsDescription: Behold the mystical features that await in the shadows. These spectral wonders are still materializing, but will soon haunt your SpookLens experience!

welcome.title: Welcome to SpookLens!
welcome.description: Prepare for a spine-tingling Halloween adventure! Let's uncover the eerie features of our haunted app.

trickOrTreat.title: Trick or Treat
trickOrTreat.description: Engage in our spooky 'Trick or Treat' feature! Choose 'Treat' for a chance to earn candies or even a rare potion. Pick 'Trick' to transform your photo with haunting effects!

captureGhostlyGlamour.title: Capture Your Ghostly Glamour
captureGhostlyGlamour.description: Snap a photo of your Halloween transformation. Our AI-powered Cloudinary editor adds an extra layer of fright to your look!

globalCovenChat.title: Global Coven Chat
globalCovenChat.description: Join our worldwide witches brew of conversation. Share your Halloween escapades with fellow creatures of the night from every dark corner of the globe!

candyCauldronLeaderboard.title: Candy Cauldron Leaderboard
candyCauldronLeaderboard.description: Compete in a global ranking to see who's the true Halloween champion!

spookyProfiles.title: Spooky Profiles
spookyProfiles.description: Discover spooky profiles from fellow spirits and see what they're up to!

brewMagicalPotions.title: Brew Magical Potions
brewMagicalPotions.description: In the future, you will collect candy to concoct powerful potions. These elixirs will enhance your photos with supernatural effects or unlock hidden features.

hauntedCandyStore.title: Haunted Candy Store
hauntedCandyStore.description: I'm preparing to stock shelves with otherworldly treats. In the future, you will exchange your hard-earned candy for potions, spells and exclusive prizes.

seanceChats.title: S√©ance Chats
seanceChats.description: I'm working on private chats! Soon, you will be able to commune with other spirits in one-on-one conversations, forging alliances with fellow Halloween enthusiasts.

evolveInnerMonster.title: Evolve Your Inner Monster
evolveInnerMonster.description: As SpookLens grows, you will unlock new ranks and levels. Each milestone will bring you closer to becoming the ultimate creature of the night. Stay tuned for this exciting feature!

sweetBeginnings.title: Sweet Beginnings
sweetBeginnings.description: As a special welcome, when you register for SpookLens, you will receive 10 candies to start your spooky journey! Begin collecting treats and casting tricks right away!

trickOrTreatModal.title: Trick or Treat
trickOrTreatModal.spiritsNotInFavor: The spirits weren't in your favor this time...
trickOrTreatModal.quickClickWarning: Quick! Click the button or lose a candy in 10 seconds!
